articles.title: Metro Manila placed under Alert Level 3 from October 16 to 31 - Rappler
articles.description: Under this alert level, only establishments like cinemas or theaters will remain closed. The rest can open to some degree.
articles.content: The only types of places still prohibited will be cinemas, theaters, kiddie parks, playgrounds, karaoke bars, clubs, and theme parks.
